Interface ChordNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChordNodeImpl

    public interface ChordNode
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Defines the standard operations as stated in the original Chord paper with methods such as find_successor and fix_fingers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • find_successor

        NodeInfo find_successor​(int id,
                        Result result)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to determine the successor node for a given node id.
        Parameters:
        id - The node identifier whose successor is to be found
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Returns:
        newNode NodeInfo object containing details of successor node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • find_predecessor

        NodeInfo find_predecessor​(int id,
                          Result result)
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to find the predecessor node for a given node id. Loop until the id is not in the range (nn, successor(nn)) at each iteration, update nn = nn.closest_preceding_finger(id) when loop ends, nn will be id's predecessor
        Parameters:
        id - The node identifier whose predecessor is to be found
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Returns:
        nn NodeInfo object containing details of predecessor node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • closest_preceding_finger

        NodeInfo closest_preceding_finger​(int id)
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to determine the closest preceding finger(CPF) of the given node identifier
        Parameters:
        id - Node identifier whose CPF is to be found.
        Returns:
        NodeInfo NodeInfo object containing details of the CPF node
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • init_finger_table

        void init_finger_table​(NodeInfo n,
                       Result result)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is called immediately after the join to initialize data structures specifically the finger table entries to assist in routing.Start by initializing the table. The (i+1)th finger table entry should be same as ith entry, if not invoke find_successor.Check if FTE needs to be updated to s, or it should continue pointing to me. Finally, set predecessor of successor as me.
        Parameters:
        n - The successor node of the current Chord Node instance
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • stabilize

        void stabilize​(Result result)
        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The stabilize function is used to periodically verify the current nodes immediate successor and tell the successor about itself In case of exception a second chance is given to find the successor (Not a 3rd though).
        Parameters:
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • fix_fingers

        void fix_fingers​(Result result)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to periodically refresh finger table entries
        Parameters:
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • update_finger_table_leave

        void update_finger_table_leave​(NodeInfo t,
                               int i,
                               NodeInfo s,
                               Result result)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to update the finger table entries of Chord nodes when a node leaves the network/ring
        Parameters:
        t - The NodeInfo object of the node which departs from the ring
        i - The ith finger table entry to be updated
        s - The NodeInfo object to be set as successor in the finger table entry
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • update_others_before_leave

        void update_others_before_leave​(Result result)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to update other nodes when a Chord Node voluntarily leaves the ring/network
        Parameters:
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

        void migrate_keys​(NodeInfo pred,
                  NodeInfo newNode,
                  Result result)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is used to move keys in range (predecessor, n) to successor node
        Parameters:
        pred - Predecessor nodeinfo object
        newNode - The current instances nodeinfo object
        result - Result object to assist in metrics collection

        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • notify_successor

        void notify_successor​(NodeInfo n)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function notifes the other nodes that it might be their predecessor
        Parameters:
        n - NodeInfo object of the probable successor node to notify
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • generate_ID

        int generate_ID​(java.lang.String key,
                int maxNodes)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        This function is used to generate a unique identifier for a key using SHA-1 algorithm
        Parameters:
        key - Key for which identifier is to be generated
        maxNodes - Maximum no of nodes in the Chord ring
        Returns:
        int unique identifier for the key
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - Due to SHA-1 usage.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • leave_ring

        boolean leave_ring​(Result result)
            throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function is called when a Chord Node leaves the ring Order of operations when a node leaves the ring: 1) Migrate keys to successor. 2) Inform successor. 3) Inform predecessor. 4) Inform bootstrap. 5) Inform other nodes. Note: Any key-related requests that are routed to this node between steps (1) and (3) will fail.
        Parameters:
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Status of leave operation
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • display_data_stored

        void display_data_stored​()
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function to display the data stored in the current Chord Node instance
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • insert_key_local

        boolean insert_key_local​(int keyID,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String value,
                         Result result)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function to insert key value pair in current Chord Node instance. Reasons to move to query the ring again for this key: -keyID does not lie in my range. -Maybe ring topology has changed while this request was routed to me.
        Parameters:
        keyID - Hashed valued for the key
        key - Key to be inserted
        value - Value associated to the key
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Indicator to check if operation was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • delete_key_local

        boolean delete_key_local​(int keyID,
                         java.lang.String key,
                         Result result)
                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function to delete key value pair in current Chord Node instance Reasons to move to query the ring again for this key: -keyID does not lie in my range. -Maybe ring topology has changed while this request was routed to me.
        Parameters:
        keyID - Hashed valued for the key
        key - Key to be deleted
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Indicator to check if operation was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • get_key_local

        java.lang.String get_key_local​(int keyID,
                               java.lang.String key,
                               Result result)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Function to relieve key value pair in current Chord Node instance Reasons to move to query the ring again for this key: Key does not lie in my range. Maybe the key migrated due to a recent node join, and this is an old query that has reached me late.
        Parameters:
        keyID - Hashed valued for the key
        key - Key to be retrieved
        result - result object to assist in metric collection
        Returns:
        boolean Indicator to check if operation was successful or not
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

        void makeCall​(NodeInfo n)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Dummy function to assist in latency calculation during node joins
        Parameters:
        n - NodeInfo object of node which is to be called
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.

      • getMetrics

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Result>> getMetrics​()
                                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This function returns the metrics collected by the chord node.
        Returns:
        The metrics of the BootStrapNode.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Due to RMI.
